item.title: Portfolio Update - May 2021
item.description: Portfolio value: CA$805,673 Below is the portfolio’s performance YTD (time-weighted cumulative return). The month’s performances assume cashflows occured mid-month. USD holdings are excluded but quite small at the moment. The performance came mainly from CTS.TO which has been a great holding so far (up more than 100% since first purchase), and NUR.CN which is down around 30% since first purchase but made a nice comeback this month. The big losers were PBX.
